opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Smith v. Commandant, United States Disciplinary Barracks

opinion:
538 U.S. 1025

SMITH
v.
COMMANDANT, UNITED STATES DISCIPLINARY BARRACKS.

No. 02-9827.

Supreme Court of United States.

May 5, 2003.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE TENTH CIRCUIT.

2

C. A. 10th Cir. Motion of petitioner to defer consideration of petition for writ of certiorari denied. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 48 Fed. Appx. 712.
